headline: Why CSX (CSX) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of freight rail services provider CSX (NASDAQ:CSX) jumped 4.7% in the afternoon session after the company announced a leadership change, naming Steve Angel as its new President and CEO to succeed Joe Hinrichs.

raw.headline: Why CSX (CSX) Stock Is Trading Up Today
raw.summary: Shares of freight rail services provider CSX (NASDAQ:CSX) jumped 4.7% in the afternoon session after the company announced a leadership change, naming Steve Angel as its new President and CEO to succeed Joe Hinrichs.

headline: CSX railroad replaces CEO after investor pressure and poor performance as Union Pacific merger looms
summary: CSX railroad announced Monday that it had replaced its CEO less than two months after an investment fund urged it to either find another railroad to merge with to better compete with the proposed transcontinental Union Pacific railroad or fire outgoing CEO Joe Hinrichs.  Hinrichs resigned to clear the way for Steve Angel to become CEO effective Sunday.  CSX has been under pressure from Ancora and other investors since Union Pacific announced its $85 billion deal to acquire Norfolk Southern, which is CSX's rival in the eastern United States.

headline: Investor: CSX can now search out ‘willing partner’ for rail merger
